dmca.title: DMCA notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jagex Copyright Team [mailto:copyright@jagex.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 22, 2007 11:55 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA notice

To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am 
authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. The information in 
the notification is accurate. I have good faith to belief that the use 
of the material identified below has not been authorised by the owner, 
its agents or the law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or

disable access to it in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright

Act.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited, UK registered 
company number 03982706.

Name and/or description of the copyrighted work which has been 
infringed: Copyrighted logo and images.

Description of the Infringing Material: We have discovered the following

websites hosted by The Planet, that sell in-game items for our online 
game 'RuneScape'. Undertaking such activity for real world money, is a 
violation of our terms and conditions, and is therefore inducing a 
breach of contract.

These sites are using our 'RuneScape' logo and our images without our 
permission. Can you please review these sites and have the offending 
materials removed please. Thank you.

Location of the Infringing Material:

http://tybuy.com
http://gogoer.com
http://mmovp.com

Date: Thursday 22nd March 2007

I can be contacted at:

Name: Mohammed Khan
Email: copyright@jagex.com
Address: St Andrews House, 90 St Andrews Road, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire

CB4 1DL, United Kingdom.

Regards,


Mohammed Khan
Jagex Ltd.

-- 

IMPORTANT NOTICE

The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any
attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be
privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the
intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please
telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your
system.
Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company
number 03982706 and a registered office at St. Andrews House, 90 St.
Andrews Road, Cambridge, CB4 1DL, UK.
